heading: Today
text: Mostly sunny and much cooler.  A chilly north breeze.  Highs in the 50s to low 60s north to south.  Winds north near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear and crisp.  Widespread frost.  Areas of river valley fog.  Lows in the upper 20s and 30s.  North winds near 10 mph through the evening, diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Thursday
text: Valley fog burning off to sunshine, mixing with some high clouds in the afternoon.  Highs in the low to mid 60s, closer to 60 over the higher terrain.  Winds light and variable.
